email.subject: File Restoration
email.body:
Hi there #PLAYERNAME#,
Unlucky my friend! You lost that round, but don't worry, you can have another go. First, you've gotta restore your files though, which if you are reading this, means you already have. I left you instructions on restoring a file on your computer just in case you needed them.
It might also be a good idea if you double check your "bin" folder. Cause, some of the hackers, they like to replace your tools... You may need to download some replacements from your Backup server!
Once you have restored your files, the contract should be restored on the Battleboard once again. So, as soon as you are ready, why don't you have another go?
